programme.desc: When a wanna-be rapper learns his ex-girlfriend is engaged to his rival, he teams up with three other misfits to steal her wedding diamonds and win her back.

programme.desc: A young mother who is married to a jealous man goes to Huda's salon in Bethlehem. However, this ordinary visit turns sour when Huda blackmails the mother to have her work for the secret service of the occupiers, thus betraying her people..

programme.title: Corsage
programme.desc: Faced with a future of strict ceremonies and royal duties, Empress Elisabeth of Austria rebels against her public image and comes up with a plan to protect her legacy.

programme.desc: A young woman with a traumatic past seeks to rebuild her life when she begins working at a New York City antique shop.

programme.title: Both Sides of the Blade
programme.desc: A woman's life spirals out of control when she becomes involved in a passionate love triangle.

programme.title: Monica
programme.desc: A woman returns home to care for her ailing mother, whom she hasn't seen in years.

programme.title: What Comes Around
programme.desc: A love affair becomes a menacing game of cat and mouse where nothing is what it seems.

programme.title: Skincare
programme.desc: A famed aesthetician faces a new challenge when a rival opens a skin care boutique directly across from her store. Suspecting that someone is trying to sabotage her, she embarks on a quest to unravel the mystery of who's trying to destroy her life.

programme.title: Armand
